scripts.build:api: cargo lambda build --package api --output-format zip --arm64 --release && mv target/lambda/api/bootstrap.zip target/lambda/api/api.zip
scripts.build:queue-processor: cargo lambda build --package queue-processor --output-format zip --arm64 --release && mv target/lambda/queue-processor/bootstrap.zip target/lambda/queue-processor/queue-processor.zip
scripts.build:game-session-notifier: cargo lambda build --package game-session-notifier --output-format zip --arm64 --release && mv target/lambda/game-session-notifier/bootstrap.zip target/lambda/game-session-notifier/game-session-notifier.zip
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:queue-processor && npm run build:game-session-notifier
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && serverless deploy --stage dev
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && serverless deploy --stage prod
